QuoteRecipientGroup.name: QuoteRecipientGroup
QuoteRecipientGroup.description: Represents a recipient group for which offers or products with the same configuration are being added. This also includes reusing these groups to add or remove recipients.

ActualMemberCount.description: The actual number of members in the quote recipient group.

Description.description: The description of the quote recipient group.

ExpectedMemberCount.description: The expected number of members in the quote recipient group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the quote recipient group.

QuoteId.description: The ID of a quote recipient group.

Status.description: Indicates whether the quote recipient group is active.
